name: CSS/HTML
description: You'll learn how to use this tree-like structure to create websites. You'll also learn how to apply styling to a website through CSS. You'll learn about CSS syntax, selectors, and units. Along the way, you'll also learn about code editors and a browser's Developer Tools.

list.title: HTML Full Course for beginners
list.decription: It contains contents for those who do not have prior knowlegde of HTML/CSS

name: Window Command line
description: You'll learn how to use this tree-like structure to create websites. You'll also learn how to apply styling to a website through CSS. You'll learn about CSS syntax, selectors, and units. Along the way, you'll also learn about code editors and a browser's Developer Tools.

list.title: Basic Windows Commands in CMD
list.decription: In this video i will show you some basic windows commands that every user should know.

list.title: How to use RD, COPYCON, IPCONFIG
list.decription: Friends in this video tutorial I am going to show you how to create a folder, how to enter in any folder by using cmd commands and how to check system IP address which will be very useful for IT students

list.title: Network Troubleshooting using Ping, Tracert, NSlookup
list.decription:
1. Ping : It is used to check the network connectivity between host to host/server.  In a simple way it is used to verify that a computer can communicate over the network with another computers or other network devices. 

2. Tracert : It is used to show details about the path that a packet takes from the source to destination 

3. Nslookup : this command fethches the dns record for a given domain or ip address.
